pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Snap walls by default, again :)

content.raw:
Oops, thank you for finding this. Whenever the grabber below was the end point of a wall, I was setting the new wall's end point instead of the start point to be on top of it (but was linking the proper grabber). I guess this only happened to the last point on your chain because being the last one drawn, the end point of the last segment was on top of the start point of the first segment.

commit  f2f5609

Oops, thank you for finding this. Whenever the grabber below was the end point of a wall, I was setting the new wall's end point instead of the start point to be on top of it (but was linking the proper grabber). I guess this only happened to the last point on your chain because being the last one drawn, the end point of the last segment was on top of the start point of the first segment.
